specials.name: Corrosive Mass
specials.description: A creature that hits the globster with a metal or wooden weapon must succeed at a DC 22 Reflex save or the weapon takes 2d6 acid damage (after dealing damage to the globster as normal). Thrown weapons and ammunition take this damage automatically with no save.

specials.name: Nausea
specials.description: Creatures hit by a Globster’s pseudopod must succeed on a DC 26 Fortitude save or be sickened 3.

specials.name: Suction
specials.description: The Globster can climb on ceilings and other inverted surfaces, though such surfaces are difficult terrain for it.

hp.value: 165 Immunities acid, critical hits, mental, piercing, precision, slashing, unconscious, visual

strikes.name: pseudopod
strikes.damage: 2d8+7 bludgeoning plus 2d6 acid Nausea and Grab
